title: Chat messaging VS Formal messaging
content: Emprez offers you 2 options to exchange messages with your team:Chat: for informal messages, that need a quick answerThis is a paid module (0,25$/month/employee), you can create public messages, in group, or with one person only.Formal messaging (message menu): for messages that require a formal request / responseThis is a feature integrated into the basic version of Emprez, you can send a message to one or more people.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
